name: Talking Tibbie
description:
Discover the adorable little goat named Tibbie for FREE!

Tibbie is a little goat who lives in a prairie and always loves wearing pink horns and shoes. She’s dainty, shy, flirty, loves fashion, and always wants to look her best. She also loves to play, laugh, jump, and dance with her friends.

Touch her with your finger to see her funny reactions and animations, listen to her songs and watch her dance, dress her up in accessories, and share funny, personalized videos and eCards with your friends.

Don’t forget to play with Tibbie or else she´ll become sad and cry!

WHAT YOU CAN DO WITH TALKING TIBBIE
- She repeats what you say!
- Enjoy Tibbie’s fun and interactive animations
- Listen to her songs and watch her dance!
- Share funny and personalized eCards with your friends

IMPORTANT NOTE FOR USERS
Your iPod, iTouch, iPhone, or iPad should have a microphone or headphones with a microphone for the “repeat my voice” feature to function within the app.
